features.featureTitle: In Hero.tsx, update the 'Book Your Detail Now' CTA button so that clicking it smoothly scrolls the page down to the booking/contact form section. The button's onClick handler must use document.getElementById('contact') (or 'booking', whichever id is present on the ContactBooking section wrapper) and call scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }) to animate the scroll. Verify the target section element has the matching id attribute.
